article.title: DSPCon Awarded Phase I Small Business Innovation Research Grant from Air Force
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: DPSCon Incorporated has received a Small Business Innovation Research Phase I contract award from the U.S. Air Force. The award will support development of a modular, expandable, open-standards addition of processing capability for propulsion health management systems that will increase the speed and depth of processing capabilities over currently utilized Full Authority Digital Engine Control hardware and software.
